title: Modern Operating Systems Fundamentals
description: Master operating system concepts through engaging stories of system administrators and engineers solving real-world infrastructure challenges. Learn process management, memory systems, and performance optimization with current industry practices and cloud-native approaches.
learningOutcomes: Design and optimize system processes for high-performance applications
Implement memory management strategies for scalable cloud applications
Debug and troubleshoot system-level performance issues in production
Apply OS concepts to modern containerized and cloud-native environments
Lead technical discussions on system architecture and performance optimization

characters.name: Maya Chen
characters.background: Former software developer turned SRE at a fast-growing fintech startup. Specializes in system performance and reliability.
characters.personality: Analytical, methodical, great at explaining complex concepts simply
characters.expertise: System monitoring, performance optimization, incident response

characters.name: David Rodriguez
characters.background: Infrastructure specialist with 8 years experience building scalable systems. Expert in containerization and cloud platforms.
characters.personality: Collaborative, patient mentor, loves solving complex technical challenges
characters.expertise: Container orchestration, cloud infrastructure, system architecture

characters.name: Sarah Kim
characters.background: Full-stack developer with deep systems knowledge. Leads performance optimization initiatives for high-traffic applications.
characters.personality: Curious, detail-oriented, excellent at connecting theory to practice
characters.expertise: Application performance, memory optimization, distributed systems

characters.name: Alex Thompson
characters.background: Systems administrator turned DevOps engineer. Bridges the gap between development and operations teams.
characters.personality: Practical, solution-focused, great at automation and tooling

topics.title: Maya's First Crisis: When Servers Go Silent
topics.description: Learn OS fundamentals through Maya's first day as SRE when a critical system failure teaches her about kernel architecture, system calls, and modern OS design
learningObjectives: Understand operating system architecture and components
Learn about kernel vs user space and system calls
Identify OS responsibilities in modern computing environments
Apply OS concepts to troubleshoot system issues
topics.storyArc: Maya joins the SRE team and faces her first major incident, learning OS fundamentals while solving a production crisis
topics.businessContext: Production system outage affecting customer transactions, requiring immediate OS-level troubleshooting

topics.title: David's Container Conundrum: The Multi-Tasking Mystery
topics.description: Master process creation, scheduling, and management through David's investigation of container performance issues in a Kubernetes cluster
learningObjectives: Understand process lifecycle and state management

Master inter-process communication mechanisms
Apply process concepts to container orchestration
topics.storyArc: David investigates why containerized applications are performing poorly, discovering process management principles
topics.businessContext: Microservices architecture experiencing latency issues, requiring process-level optimization

topics.title: Sarah's Memory Leak Hunt: The Case of the Vanishing RAM
topics.description: Explore virtual memory, paging, and memory allocation through Sarah's debugging of a memory-intensive data processing application
learningObjectives: Understand virtual memory and address translation

Master memory leak detection and prevention
Apply memory concepts to optimize application performance

topics.businessContext: Data processing pipeline consuming excessive memory, threatening system stability

topics.title: Alex's Storage Saga: The Great Data Migration

learningObjectives: Understand file system architecture and operations

Master file system performance tuning
Apply storage concepts to modern cloud environments

topics.businessContext: Company needs to migrate to cloud storage while maintaining performance and reliability
